name: Puppet Showdown
description:
2 to 4 players

You can play with: 

- WASD + SPACE 

- Arrow keys + Enter

- Gamepads (Left stick + A/X)

Fight your friends in this brawler inspired by Guignol, the traditional french puppet show! Use your ability to hide under the stage to defend yourself and to surprise your opponents!

/!\ Careful, the game is a bit buggy, I didn't have time to correct everything but I wanted to publish a first rough version.
